body: Atria Hair Clinic welcomes guests from across Europe and the Middle East who look for natural, undetectable hair restoration.
Every treatment plan is prepared by Dr. Karimov and his medical board after trichoscopic analysis, density goals and donor management review.
highlights: Private recovery suites and airport transfers included
Digital imaging to preview your new hairline

treatments.title: Personalised transplant techniques
treatments.description: Choose the method that fits your donor capacity and lifestyle. Each package includes blood tests, PRP session and aftercare kit.

items.name: Sapphire FUE
items.summary: Ultra-fine sapphire blades for precise channel opening and reduced trauma.

items.name: Direct Hair Implantation (DHI)
items.summary: Implanter pen allows full control over angle, direction and depth for every graft.
points: Ideal for crown filling and touch-ups

items.name: Hybrid Restoration & PRP
items.summary: Combine beard or body grafts with scalp FUE and platelet-rich plasma support.
points: Balances donor management for advanced hair loss
